bio:
Amsterdam-based Senior Designer with over 7 years working with agencies, cultural organizations, and brands, specializing in digital interactions and service innovation.

My particular interest lies in exploring the interaction between people and technology beyond traditional devices, seamlessly integrating digital elements into physical spaces. Currently at Random Studio, previously at Strelka Institute, and Marka.

Selected clients: Lululemon, Nike, Boucheron, Calvin Klein, Tommy Hilfiger, Zara, CitizenM, Rimowa, Strelka Institute, The Ural Industrial Biennal of Contemporary Art.
